```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
example.df <-
  tibble(
    vec.numeric=1:4,
    vec.char=c("my", "name", "is", "Jeff"),
    vec.factor=factor(c("male","male", "female", "female"))
  )

plot_df=
  tibble(
      x=rnorm(1000, mean=1, sd=.5),
      y=1+2*x+rnorm(1000)
  )
```

## Including Plots

```{r histogram, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=x)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=y)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r scatter plot, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggsave("point plot.pdf", height=4, width=6)
```
